Name: Lament
About the game: Lament, an NES styled Action-Platformer about a wolf with a buster sword! Inspired mostly by Castlevania and Ninja Gaiden on the NES. Swing your way through countless enemies and try to restore the cursed sword to its former glory!
Meta Title: Lament: Mar 31, 2017, Radcroc and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Lament? Check out the release date (Mar 31, 2017), developer insights from Radcroc, and a complete game summary.
